General.Name: Essen Tech Co. Ltd
General.Description: Essen Tech Co., Ltd. provides brass alloy valves for gas, housing, automobile, and shipbuilding industries in South Korea. It offers valves and fittings for air conditioning, piping valves, pipe fittings, valves for gas containers, and OEM products, as well as distributes heating systems. The company was formerly known as Wooil Metal and changed its name to Essen Tech Co., Ltd. in December 1999. Essen Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Gunsan, South Korea.
